mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_equipment_store f on a.ecode=f.ecode where a.ecode=#{ecode} and f.store_id=#{store_id}

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id where a.ecode=#{ecode}
select count(ecode) from ems_equipment_workunit where ecode=#{ecode} and workunit_id#{workunit_id}
select count(ecode) from ems_equipment_store where ecode=#{ecode} and store_id#{store_ids}
select count(ecode) from ems_equipment_repair where ecode=#{ecode} and repair_id#{repair_id}
select count(ecode) from ems_equipment_pole where ecode=#{ecode} and pole_id#{pole_id}
select * from ems_equipment_workunit where ecode=#{ecode} and type='borrow'
